00049 class PhysMotionState : public btMotionState {
00050     private:
00051         friend class ActorBase;
00052         Ogre::SceneNode* snode;
00053         btTransform initposition;
00054 
00055     public:
00056         PhysMotionState();
00057         PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00058         virtual ~PhysMotionState();
00059         void SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00060         void SetPosition(PhysVector3 position);
00061 
00062         virtual void getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const;
00063         virtual void setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans);
00064 };

00069 ActorBase::ActorBase (PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group, PhysWorld* World)
00070 {
00071     this->GameWorld = World;
00072     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00073     this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00074     this->MotionState = new PhysMotionState(this->node);
00075     this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00076     this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00077 }
00078 
00079 ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00080 {
00081     delete MotionState;
00082     delete Shape;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00086 {
00087     // Get the mesh from the entity
00088     Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00089 
00090     // Get the submesh and associated data
00091     Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00092 
00093     Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00094     Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00095 
00096     // Get the position element
00097     const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00098 
00099     // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00100     Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00101 
00102     // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00103     Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00104 
00105     // --------------------------
00106 
00107     // Get the number of triangles
00108     unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00109 
00110     // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00111     Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00112     unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00113 
00114     // --------------------
00115 
00116     // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00117     unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00118 
00119     //
00120     float* pReal = NULL;
00121 
00122     for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00123     {
00124         posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00125         Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00126         vertices[j] = pt;
00127     }
00128 
00129     vBuffer->unlock();
00130 
00131     // --------------------
00132 
00133     size_t index_offset = 0;
00134 
00135     bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00136 
00137     // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00138     unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00139     unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00140 
00141     if (use32bitindexes)
00142     {
00143         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00144         {
00145             indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00146         }
00147     }
00148     else
00149     {
00150         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00151         {
00152          indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     iBuffer->unlock();
00157 
00158     // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00159 
00160     // The Bullet triangle mesh
00161     //Shape = static_cast<btTriangleMesh*>(Shape);
00162     btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00163 
00164     // Setup the tri mesh
00165     btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00166     int i=0;
00167 
00168     // For every triangle
00169     for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00170     {
00171         // Set each vertex
00172 
00173         vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00174 
00175         vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00176 
00177         vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00178 
00179         // Add it into the trimesh
00180         trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00181 
00182         // Increase index count
00183         i+=3;
00184     }
00185 
00186     // --------------- Cleanup
00187 
00188     delete[] vertices;
00189     delete[] indices;
00190 
00191     ///TODO - Check for thread safety
00192     Shape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(trimesh, true);
00193 }
00194 
00195 void ActorBase::CreateEntity (PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group)
00196 {
00197     this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00198 }
00199 
00200 void ActorBase::CreateSceneNode ()
00201 {
00202     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00203 }
00204 
00205 void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00206 {
00207     this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00208 }

00211 {
00212     //empty function to be redifined in subclasses
00213 }

00215 void ActorBase::SetBulletInitLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00216 {
00217     this->MotionState->initposition.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00218 }

00220 void ActorBase::SetOgreOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00221 {
00222     this->node->setOrientation(Rotation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00223 }

00225 void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00226 {
00227     //empty function to be redifined in subclasses
00228 }

00230 void ActorBase::SetLocation (PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z)
00231 {
00232     PhysVector3 temp(x,y,z);
00233     this->SetLocation(temp);
00234 }
00235 
00236 void ActorBase::SetLocation (PhysVector3 Place)
00237 {
00238     this->SetBulletLocation(Place);
00239     this->SetOgreLocation(Place);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void ActorBase::SetInitLocation(PhysVector3 Location)
00243 {
00244     this->SetBulletInitLocation(Location);
00245 }
00246 
00247 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z, PhysReal w)
00248 {
00249     PhysQuaternion temp(x,y,z,w);
00250     this->SetOrientation(temp);
00251 }
00252 
00253 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00254 {
00255     this->SetBulletOrientation(Rotation);
00256     this->SetOgreOrientation(Rotation);
00257 }
00258 
00259 void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00260 {
00261     PhysVector3 temp;
00262     temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00263     this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00264     this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00265 }

00272 ActorDynRigid::ActorDynRigid (PhysReal mass, PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group, PhysWorld* World) : ActorBase (name, file, group, World)
00273 {
00274     this->CreateRigidObject(mass);
00275 }
00276 
00277 ActorDynRigid::~ActorDynRigid ()
00278 {
00279     delete physrigidbody;
00280 }
00281 
00282 void ActorDynRigid::CreateRigidObject (PhysReal pmass)
00283 {
00284     btScalar bmass=pmass;
00285     this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00286 }
00287 
00288 void ActorDynRigid::AddObjectToWorld (PhysWorld *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* World)
00289 {
00290     World->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00291     AttachToGraphics();
00292 }
00293 
00294 void ActorDynRigid::SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00295 {
00296     btTransform temp = this->physrigidbody->getWorldTransform();
00297     temp.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00298 }
00299 
00300 void ActorDynRigid::SetBulletOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00301 {
00302     btTransform temp = this->physrigidbody->getWorldTransform();
00303     temp.setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00304 }
00305 
00306 void ActorDynRigid::CreateShapeFromMesh()
00307 {
00308     this->CreateTrimesh();
00309     this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00310 }

00395 
00396 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00397 {
00398     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00399 }
00400 
00401 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00402 {
00403     this->snode=scenenode;
00404     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00405 }
00406 
00407 PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00408 {
00409     if (snode!=NULL)
00410     {
00411         delete snode;
00412     }
00413 }
00414 
00415 void PhysMotionState::SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00416 {
00417     this->snode=scenenode;
00418 }
00419 
00420 void PhysMotionState::SetPosition(PhysVector3 position)
00421 {
00422     this->initposition.setOrigin(position.GetBulletVector3());
00423 }
00424 
00425 void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00426 {
00427     worldTrans=initposition;
00428 }
00429 
00430 void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00431 {
00432     btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00433     this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00434     btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00435     this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00436 }
